import ReactMarkdown from 'react-markdown' import Layout from './Layout'; const Post = ({post}) => { const authorName = post.author ? post.author.name : 'Unknown author' return(
{/*
  • Title: {post.title}
  • AuthorName: by {authorName}
  • Content:
*/}
Title AuthorName Content
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
) } export default Post
